mapper.update: update workAttendance set userId = #{userId},attendanceDate = #{attendanceDate},week = #{week},startTime = #{startTime},endTime = #{endTime},allHour = #{allHour},state = #{state},workState = #{workState} where id = #{id}
update workAttendance set state = #{state} where id = #{id}
update workattendance set startTime = #{startTime},workState = 1 where id = #{id}
update workAttendance set endTime = #{endTime},allHour = #{allHour},workState = 2 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select w.id,u.name,w.attendanceDate,w.`week`,w.startTime,w.endTime,w.allHour,w.state from workAttendance w inner join sys_user u on u.id = w.userId where userId = 1 order by attendanceDate desc
